data.lyric:
[ti:Be Like That (feat. Swae Lee & Khalid)]
[ar:Kane Brown/Swae Lee/Khalid]
[al:Be Like That (feat. Swae Lee & Khalid)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Be Like That (feat. Swae Lee & Khalid) - Kane Brown/Swae Lee/Khalid
[00:03.56]Lyrics by：Kane Brown/Swae Lee/Alexander "Eskeerdo" Izquierdo/Khalid Robinson/Ryan Vojtesak
[00:07.43]Composed by：Kane Brown/Swae Lee/Alexander "Eskeerdo" Izquierdo/Khalid Robinson/Ryan Vojtesak
[00:11.29]Kane Brown：
[00:11.89]I might be better on my own
[00:14.99]I hate you blowing up my phone
[00:17.38]I wish I never met your ass
[00:20.54]Sometimes it be like that
[00:22.80]But I'm not myself the nights you're gone
[00:25.49]There ain't no way I'm moving on
[00:28.39]I'm not afraid to need you bad
[00:31.81]Sometimes it be like that
[00:33.38]We both wanna love
[00:34.40]We both wanna slide
[00:35.40]We both wanna argue until we're both right
[00:38.18]And you want a hug
[00:39.54]I kiss you goodnight
[00:40.84]Maybe we're both just out of our mind
[00:43.62]Ooh
[00:44.67]You throw tantrums while I'm twisting up
[00:47.18]No medicine is fixing us
[00:50.32]Can't tell you why but tell you what
[00:54.30]You got me thinking
[00:55.55]Kane Brown/Swae Lee：
[00:56.35]I might be better on my own
[00:58.64]I hate you blowing up my phone
[01:01.33]I wish I never met your ass
[01:04.75]Sometimes it be like that
[01:06.87]But I'm not myself the nights you're gone
[01:09.49]There ain't no way I'm moving on
[01:12.44]I'm not afraid to need you bad
[01:15.29]Bad
[01:15.98]Sometimes it be like that
[01:17.47]Swae Lee：
[01:17.79]I cross the seas wit' you
[01:18.76]Hey seas
[01:19.64]Wasn't even supposed to be wit' you
[01:21.50]Yeah be
[01:21.74]Yeah and it gets crazy in the night
[01:25.63]I cannot sleep with you Sleep with you
[01:28.14]And I could keep you nice and warm
[01:30.59]Ayy
[01:30.99]Won't do no thinking I'm in love
[01:33.24]Yeah yeah
[01:33.91]If I was to give you the world Yeah
[01:36.47]That's anything that you can think of Of
[01:39.28]Got too much going to be upset
[01:42.78]I swear I'd rather be your friend
[01:45.39]I said I'm gonna be right back
[01:48.16]It hurts sometimes it be like that
[01:50.73]Kane Brown/Swae Lee/Both：
[01:51.54]I might be better on my own
[01:53.62]I hate you blowing up my phone
[01:56.35]I wish I never met your ass
[01:59.86]Sometimes it be like that
[02:02.00]But I'm not myself the nights you're gone
[02:04.66]There ain't no way I'm moving on
[02:07.61]I'm not afraid to need you bad
[02:11.01]Sometimes it be like that
[02:12.95]Khalid：
[02:13.12]Sometimes when you thought you found the love of your life
[02:16.84]Ooh ooh ooh
[02:17.41]Now you're thinking I'm just one of those guys leading on
[02:21.14]I can't help when you read it wrong
[02:23.95]Don't know why I trip on us
[02:27.08]You put me down I pick you up
[02:29.74]Can't tell you why but tell you what You should know that
[02:33.75]You got me thinking
[02:34.84]Kane Brown/Khalid：
[02:35.40]I might be better on my own
[02:37.74]I hate you blowing up my phone
[02:40.51]I wish I never met your ass
[02:44.06]Sometimes it be like that
[02:46.06]But I'm not myself the nights you're gone
[02:48.78]There ain't no way I'm moving on
[02:51.58]I'm not afraid to need you bad
[02:55.14]Sometimes it be like that
[02:56.96]Khalid：
[02:57.62]Yeah yeah
[02:58.26]Sometimes when you're falling off track
[03:00.93]Baby don't you leave me like that
[03:03.53]Don't cry
[03:05.02]'Cause we're both just out of our mind yeah ayy-ayy
data.trans:
[ti:Be Like That (feat. Swae Lee & Khalid)]
[ar:Kane Brown/Swae Lee/Khalid]
[al:Be Like That (feat. Swae Lee & Khalid)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:03.56]//
[00:07.43]//
[00:11.29]//
[00:11.89]我一个人可能会过得更好
[00:14.99]我讨厌你不停地打来电话
[00:17.38]我希望我从未认识你
[00:20.54]有时 一切就像这样
[00:22.80]你离开后的夜晚 我失魂落魄
[00:25.49]我无法放下过去
[00:28.39]我不会畏惧心底对你的渴望
[00:31.81]有时 一切就像这样
[00:33.38]我们都渴望爱
[00:34.40]我们都想得过且过
[00:35.40]我们想大吵一架 直到我们高兴为止
[00:38.18]你想要拥抱
[00:39.54]我以吻向你道晚安
[00:40.84]也许我们都失去理智
[00:43.62]//
[00:44.67]当我胡思乱想时 你大发脾气
[00:47.18]我们无可救药
[00:50.32]无法告诉你原因 只能吐露心声
[00:54.30]你让我思绪万千
[00:55.55]//
[00:56.35]我一个人可能会过得更好
[00:58.64]我讨厌你不停地打来电话
[01:01.33]我希望我从未认识你
[01:04.75]有时 一切就像这样
[01:06.87]你离开后的夜晚 我失魂落魄
[01:09.49]我无法放下过去
[01:12.44]我不会畏惧心底对你的渴望
[01:15.29]非常需要你
[01:15.98]有时 一切就像这样
[01:17.47]//
[01:17.79]我与你远渡重洋
[01:18.76]浩瀚的海洋
[01:19.64]我根本不该与你在一起
[01:21.50]//
[01:21.74]深夜时分 意乱情迷
[01:25.63]我不能与你同枕共眠
[01:28.14]我可以让你感到温暖
[01:30.59]//
[01:30.99]我不会意识到我坠入情网
[01:33.24]//
[01:33.91]如果我曾给你全世界
[01:36.47]这是你能想到的一切
[01:39.28]拥有太多让人感到局促不安
[01:42.78]我发誓我宁愿做你的朋友
[01:45.39]我说我会回到你身边
[01:48.16]伤心不已 有时 一切就像这样
[01:50.73]//
[01:51.54]我一个人可能会过得更好
[01:53.62]我讨厌你不停地打来电话
[01:56.35]我希望我从未认识你
[01:59.86]有时 一切就像这样
[02:02.00]你离开后的夜晚 我失魂落魄
[02:04.66]我无法放下过去
[02:07.61]我不会畏惧心底对你的渴望
[02:11.01]有时 一切就像这样
[02:12.95]//
[02:13.12]有时你以为你找到一生的真爱
[02:16.84]//
[02:17.41]如今你认为我不过是个玩弄真心的男孩
[02:21.14]当你误解我时 我无能为力
[02:23.95]我不懂为什么我无法释怀
[02:27.08]你让我心灰意冷 而我让你重振旗鼓
[02:29.74]无法告诉你原因 可我会将你应该知道的真相告诉你
[02:33.75]你让我思绪万千
[02:34.84]//
[02:35.40]我一个人可能会过得更好
[02:37.74]我讨厌你不停地打来电话
[02:40.51]我希望我从未认识你
[02:44.06]有时 一切就像这样
[02:46.06]你离开后的夜晚 我失魂落魄
[02:48.78]我无法放下过去
[02:51.58]我不会畏惧心底对你的渴望
[02:55.14]有时 一切就像这样
[02:56.96]//
[02:57.62]//
[02:58.26]有时当你误入歧途
[03:00.93]宝贝 别像这样毅然地离开我
[03:03.53]别哭
[03:05.02]因为我们都失去理智
